hypothesis_content.title: Solana Ecosystem Momentum After Stress Test
hypothesis_content.statement: When SOL price drops >8% in a day (stress event) but recovers >50% of the loss within the next 24 hours, SOL and top Solana ecosystem tokens (approved list) will outperform median crypto asset over the next 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sharp recovery after stress shows strong buyer conviction. Analysts questioning Solana's momentum (per news) could create contrarian opportunity if resilience is demonstrated. Ecosystem tokens often follow SOL leadership.
entry_conditions: SOL recovers >50% of that loss within next 24 hours (close to close)
SOL volume on recovery day > 1.5x 10-day average
Market regime ≠ STRESS (isolated SOL stress only)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL breaks below the stress-day low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 3-day return of SOL + top ecosystem tokens underperforms median crypto asset in 12 of next 20 occurrences.
